alert.note: Alert for Harper; Kingman; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Harper, southeastern Kingman and northwestern Sumner Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Norwich to Harper to 5 miles southeast of Attica. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anthony, Harper, Conway Springs, Argonia, Norwich, Milan, Danville, Freeport, Rago and Runnymede. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
